overview.en: The vision of Liquor chain is to, through blockchain technology, build a decentralized and securely encrypted distributional liquor exchange as well as a platform for futures & spot trading and community to connect the digital world with the real world.
overview.zh: LC 通过区块链技术构建一个去中心化、安全加密的分布式基酒交易所、期现货交易及社区平台，从而联通数字世界和现实世界，在创造一个可信商业环境的同时，来重新构建中国酒行业的价值体系。
